EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_Intro to Apache Tomcat 8 10AM.Confirmation 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Confirmation: Intro to Apache Tomcat 8
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Your registration is confirmed for the webinar Intro to Apache Tomcat 8 and Daniel Mikusa and Stuart Williams. We are looking forward to having you join us. To help maximize your webinar experience we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html. Event Details:
Date: Tuesday, February 11, 2014 North America: 10:00am PST (San Francisco, GMT-08:00) Join the WebEx Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show all global call-in numbers Show toll-free dialing restrictions
Access code: 660 903 236
Thank you,
